title: Vase, 1920–40
markings: On bottom of dish, in black, a triangle containing a horizontal line with a rising perpendicular arrow all surmounting "DEK. 256".  Also, raised "212 b.".
description: Spherical body with mouth at top center and two molded protrusions coming from the top and curving down as they widen.  Off-white ground color with gray-speckled appearance.  Speckled brown on the top edge and the two protrusions.  Pattern of wavy and straight brown lines with scattered small blue circles repeats on both sides between the protrusions.

tombstone.epitaph:
Vase, 1920–40.
1920–40. Glazed earthenware. Gift of Victor Wiener. 1996-18-15.
